title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.2 - Advertising and promotions generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.2 - Advertising and promotions generally

State Regulations
(a) Sections
86.3
through and including 86.6 of
this Part describe the kinds of advertising and promotional materials that
manufacturers or wholesalers may give, sell or install in a licensed retail
premises. Unless specifically stated otherwise, such sections apply both to
on-premises and off-premises licensees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
86.2

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
